Recap: Kelly asks John to help her find her mother's killer. But he asks her not to tell Todd what they are doing or trust him. Todd finds that his daughter, Dani wants to be part of Langston's play that incriminates him regarding Starr and Cole. Schuyler holds Gigi hostage and tells her he won't let her go because he's lost her due to a lie. He declares that he has nothing but knows she still loves him. Rex and Bo go to negotiate with him. But he does not put down the gun and fires a shot. Jessica is still determined to get Cristian back and Natalie admits that she is not "complete" with John and Marty having a baby and living together. Allison drops the bombshell upon Roxy that her son is not Rex. Her son is Schuyler.

Todd: All right. Rock on.
